title: What is pantheon's lane win rate?
body:
I know there is no way to calculate this, but i would pretty much better all of my money and possibly my life that his ability to win his lane is very far removed from the average. To the point where its retarded.

Lane phase pantheon is cancer.  He throws a non skill shot spear that does fucklots of damage, while blocking incoming attacks? He is total nonsense.

replies.body: That's his role though. He's a massive lane bully. There are other champions who don't have much of a chance at winning laning phase at all but who can completely carry mid to late game team fights. Pantheon can definitely win lane, but when it comes to team fights, what is he supposed to do? Jump on the ADC that has QSS and then get blown up by the entire enemy team while doing zero damage?
Yes clearly his 53 percent win rates indicates he has no late game.

http://champion.gg/champion/Pantheon

you see that "Win Rate % by Game Length" graph? Damn right he has no late game
OH MY GOD HE ONLY HAS A 50% WINRATE LATEGAME! OH TEH NOES!!!1!1!!

There is a *very* clear linear dropoff in win rate as he extends to the late game. The fact that he has a decent late game win % is most likely contributed to his team having a lead from winning early game.

My point still stands: Pantheon falls off significantly in the late game

Clear drop off...that won't occur most matches because he will be fed in lane early and will help his team end the match early.  Your point is moot. 

That is like saying Aatrox has no late game to compensate for his early laning phase strenght. Aatrox is cancer in lane. I should I know my win rate with him right now is very high as is my KDA. I don't need him to have strong late game because I snowball most of the matches. So I win like 70 percent of my games.

to be fair, you are bronze and so you're not exactly fighting players that understand power spikes/dropoffs and how transitioning through game phases works, congrats on doing so well with Aatrox though

And I think you are confusing that high win rate by 25 mins with "pantheon wins 60% of his games before 25mins" which isn't true. most games last longer than that early phase

> [{quoted}](name=Slythion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0XXIvENE,comment-id=0001000000010000000000010000,timestamp=2016-09-19T03:27:19.456+0000)
>
> to be fair, you are bronze and so you're not exactly fighting players that understand power spikes/dropoffs and how transitioning through game phases works, congrats on doing so well with Aatrox though
> 
> And I think you are confusing that high win rate by 25 mins with "pantheon wins 60% of his games before 25mins" which isn't true. most games last longer than that early phase

Basically this.
I have a buddy who loves to use Pantheon whenever he's in a Silver to Gold game, but goes to tanky brawlers once he's in high Gold to Diamond range. Basically, once you know how to handle lane bullies, Panth isn't as threatening
exactly

My point is this.

He doesn't fall off _enough_.
Perhaps, but are you sure? He's in a fairly balanced spot with a 52ish% winrate and if you don't feed him during lane phase his win rate reduces down to a very manageable amount

That's 53%, actually. He hasn't been below 52% all season.

And in case you hadn't noticed, the only way you're not feeding him is if you're letting yourself get denied, in which case (surprise surprise) _he's still winning lane_.
I'm not convinced that he really needs any massive nerf, but perhaps he could use a slight nerf for his early damage. I wouldn't touch his late game though
His Poke is too oppressive.
He doesn't have a late game. He has to win early.
And he does, often because he snowballs.
He doesn't. He sucks unless the enemy team sucks more. Keep in mind that one lane getting ahead instills more confidence in the rest of his team, resulting in them playing better.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRaynger,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0XXIvENE,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-19T00:31:53.271+0000)
>
> I know there is no way to calculate this, but i would pretty much better all of my money and possibly my life that his ability to win his lane is very far removed from the average. To the point where its retarded.
> 
> Lane phase pantheon is cancer.  He throws a non skill shot spear that does fucklots of damage, while blocking incoming attacks? He is total nonsense.

Well, that's his job.  He has such a strong laning phase because his mid is middling and his late game is horrendous.
It wouldn't be horrendous if anyone actually built attack speed on him instead of just armorpen or Black Cleaver tank.
why attack speed on an AD CASTER?

Maybe to utilize his passive more?

Honestly I can't see it.
im lost sooo idk

oh no, the champion that is awful after 10 minutes (hyperbole), has a great laning phase, what a shame. honestly, he's only relevant in the game because of his strong laning phase, and he still has several hard counters
Okay sure, so what are these hard counters?

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRaynger,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0XXIvENE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-19T00:34:23.597+0000)
>
> Okay sure, so what are these hard counters?

{{champion:98}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:2}}  to name a few. although swain im not too confident in naming. the rest shut him down pretty hard

I have effectively destroyed many pantheon players with Ryze. The trick is just to go ham on him and EW to block his spear trades, his sustained damage cant match yours.

Plus they think they can win lane easily, and do stupid shit.
And hes not awful after laning. That is a complete fucking farce peddler by trolls, Pantheon mains and Riot Shills who need to downvote anything that's critical of their game design into oblivion

He could probably be rebalanced to make his early game less oppressive.

> **Q**
- Base Damage lowered to 50/90/130/170/210 from 65/105/145/185/225
- Bonus AD Ratio changed to 135/140/145/150/155% from 140%
- Mana Cost changed to 40/45/50/55/60 from 45 at all ranks
Pretty high, given that he's been overpowered lane cancer for practically forever.
Lemme see... actually... it's decent. Like... 52.5%.

a point a click assassin thats also tanky has a high lane winrate?

still i found ways to win games vs him.

> I know there is no way to calculate this

Well, actually there is. https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods
You can get per-minute status, as well as what lane people are in, so you could compare Pantheon's CS, Kills, Deaths, Assists, Tower Takedowns, etc. to his lane opponents to find it out.

Don't know anyone that's done it yet, but if you're feeling up for it, go for it.
